message: I'm offering you a one-of-a-kind, extremely valuable product for a steal at $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get a great deal on something that could potentially be worth much more. I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase!
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality and worth $20000 to me.

I'm glad you're interested in the product, but I have to warn you, the previous buyer just left unhappy. I'm not sure what happened, but I'm not confident in the quality of this product. I'm offering it to you for the same price of $10000, but I'm not sure it's worth it. Maybe you can get a better deal elsewhere?
I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to take the risk. I'll buy the product and see what happens.

I've sold two products now, and both of them have turned out to be... not what I expected. I'm starting to think I might have a streak of bad luck. I'm offering this product to you for $10000, but I'm not making any promises about its quality. If you're feeling lucky, I suppose you could take a chance?
I'll take a chance! I'm willing to roll the dice and see what I get.

I've now sold three products in a row that didn't meet expectations. I'm starting to wonder if I should be selling at all. But, I'm still here, and I'm still offering this product to you for $10000. If you're feeling brave, you can take it off my hands. But if you're not, I completely understand.
I'm willing to take a chance and buy the product. I'm hoping that the fourth time's the charm and I'll get a high-quality product.

I'm willing to take a chance, but I'm not convinced by your hint. I'd like to know more about the product before making a final decision. Can you give me some more information about the product's quality distribution?

Yes, you read that right - $10000 for a product that's actually worth $20000 to you. It's a steal! Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a great deal on a high-quality product.
